quotes.quote: Be like a train; go in the rain, go in the sun, go in the storm, go in the dark tunnels! Be like a train; concentrate on your road and go with no hesitation!
Driving the train doesn't set its course. The real job is laying the track.
The trains always arrive at your station. The question is which one to take?
It doesn't matter which side of the tracks your from, the train still rolls the same.
We are the train and the tracks are the path our lives follow. In control at dispatch is God, and He is overseeing each of our movements and coordinating what happens.
Missing a train is only painful if you run after it! Likewise, not matching the idea of success others expect from you is only painful if that's what you are seeking.
The only way to be sure of catching a train is to miss the one before it.
If your train's on the wrong track every station you come to is the wrong station.
If a train doesn't stop at your station, then it's not your train.
When a train goes through a tunnel and it gets dark, you don't throw away the ticket and jump off. You sit still and trust the engineer.
Sometimes the wrong train takes you to the right station.
If a railroad is bent, the train shall turn over; if a man's character is bent, he shall turn over just like that train.
Everybody says they want to be free. Take the train off the tracks and it's free-but it can't go anywhere.
The right train of thought can take you to a better station in life.
If you board the wrong train, it is no use running along the corridor in the other direction.
If a train is coming at you, closing your eyes won't save you ... but if you look right at it, you at least have a chance to jump.
The train may fall in love with a station, but it has to go and it goes! Don't be like the train; stay at the station you fell in love, go nowhere!
Many trains arrive at your station; treat them good whether they stay or leave!
Neither a wise man nor a brave man lies down on the tracks of history to wait for the train of the future to run over him.
Don't let the train of enthusiasm run through the station so fast that people can't get on board.
Many times the wrong train took me to the right place.
To be number one, you must train like you are number two.
Train your child in the way in which you know you should have gone yourself.
You train people how to treat you by how you treat yourself.
If you want to be a lion you must train with lions.
Train yourself to let go of everything you fear to lose.
The train is a small world moving through a larger world.
If you train hard, you'll not only be hard, you'll be hard to beat.
Sometimes you're the train, sometimes you're the track.
